text: Cadorago is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Como in the Italian region of Lombardy. It is about northwest of Milan and about southwest of Como. As of 30 September 2017, 7,953 people lived there. It has an area of 7.19 kmÂ². Cadorago is next to these municipalities: Bregnano, Fino Mornasco, Guanzate, Lomazzo, Vertemate con Minoprio. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:Settlements in Como
title: Cadorago
